title: TARSCO Wins Regional Science Olympiad
excerpt: Our science team triumphed in the regional competition, showcasing excellence in innovation and research.
content: Our dedicated science team participated in the Regional Science Olympiad and emerged victorious, demonstrating the caliber of our students and faculty.
author: Mr. Kwesi Boateng

title: New Science Laboratory Inauguration
excerpt: State-of-the-art laboratory facility officially opened to support advanced STEM learning.
content: TARSCO inaugurated its new science laboratory with cutting-edge equipment to enhance hands-on learning in physics, chemistry, and biology.
author: Dr. Kwame Asante

title: Annual Sports Day Celebrated
excerpt: Students showcase athletic prowess in friendly competitions across multiple sports disciplines.
content: The annual sports day brought together students across all classes for exciting competitions in athletics, football, basketball, and volleyball.
author: Coach Ama Mensah
